languages.text: Дознанию не удается установить никакой вины за стариком. На его теле нет знаков поклонения {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Архиврагу{/g}, он не признается в злодеяниях и, кажется, весьма шокирован вестью о смерти Леди Теодоры и измене Войгтвира. Даже суровые меры допроса, чуть не убившие немощного старца, не принудили его сознаться.

The investigation has found no wrongdoing the old man could be held accountable for. His body bears no signs of worshipping the {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Archenemy{/g}. He has confessed to no crime and seems quite shocked at the news of Lady Theodora's death and Voigtvir's treachery. The harsh interrogation techniques have taken an almost fatal toll on his failing health, yet forced no admission of guilt from him.
languages.original_text: Дознанию не удается установить никакой вины за стариком. Даже суровые меры допроса, чуть не убившие немощного старца, не принудили его сознаться.

traits.locale_text: An investigation has found no wrongdoing the old man could be held accountable for. His body bears no signs of him worshipping the Archenemy. He has confessed to no crime and seems quite shocked at the news of Lady Theodora's death and Voigtvir's treachery. Even the harsh interrogation techniques that almost killed the ailing old man forced no admission of guilt from him.

Even the harsh interrogation techniques that almost killed the ailing old man forced no admission of guilt from him.

The investigation has found no wrongdoing the old man could be held accountable for. His body bears no signs of worshipping the {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Archenemy{/g}. He has confessed to no crime and seems quite shocked at the news of Lady Theodora's death and Voigtvir's treachery. The investigation has found no wrongdoing the old man could be held accountable for. His body bears no signs of worshipping the {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Archenemy{/g}. He has confessed to no crime and seems quite shocked at the news of Lady Theodora's death and Voigtvir's treachery. The harsh interrogation techniques have taken an almost fatal toll on his failing health, yet forced no admission of guilt from him.

languages.text: La investigación no ha encontrado ningún fallo en los actos del hombre. Su cuerpo no presenta ninguna marca de adoración del {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Archienemigo{/g}. No ha confesado cometer ningún delito y parece sinceramente sorprendido por la muerte de lady Theodora y la traición de Voigtvir. Los rigores de la interrogación casi acaban con su frágil vida, pero no consiguen arrancarle ninguna admisión de culpa.
languages.original_text: The investigation has found no wrongdoing the old man could be held accountable for. His body bears no signs of worshipping the {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Archenemy{/g}. He has confessed to no crime and seems quite shocked at the news of Lady Theodora's death and Voigtvir's treachery. The harsh interrogation techniques have taken an almost fatal toll on his failing health, yet forced no admission of guilt from him.

traits.locale_text: La investigación no ha encontrado ningún fallo en los actos del hombre. Su cuerpo no presenta ninguna marca de adoración del Archienemigo. No ha confesado cometer ningún delito y parece sinceramente sorprendido por la muerte de lady Theodora y la traición de Voigtvir. Los rigores de la interrogación casi acaban con su frágil vida, pero no consiguen arrancarle ninguna admisión de culpa.

languages.text: 調査の結果、この老人から責任を問われるような悪行は見つからなかった。男の体に{g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}渾沌の勢力{/g}を崇拝した形跡はない。男が罪を自白することはなく、シオドーラ様の死とボイドヴィルの裏切りを聞き、かなりショックを受けているようだ。厳しい尋問を受けて、男の体はもう限界という状態だったが、罪を認めることはなかった。
languages.original_text: The investigation has found no wrongdoing the old man could be held accountable for. His body bears no signs of worshipping the {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Archenemy{/g}. He has confessed to no crime and seems quite shocked at the news of Lady Theodora's death and Voigtvir's treachery. The harsh interrogation techniques have taken an almost fatal toll on his failing health, yet forced no admission of guilt from him.

traits.locale_text: 調査の結果、この老人から責任を問われるような悪行は見つからなかった。男の体に渾沌の勢力を崇拝した形跡はない。男が罪を自白することはなく、シオドーラ様の死とボイドヴィルの裏切りを聞き、かなりショックを受けているようだ。厳しい尋問を受けて、男の体はもう限界という状態だったが、罪を認めることはなかった。

languages.text: 调查发现，这位老人没有犯下过任何罪行，也没有任何可以追究的责任。他的身体没有任何崇拜{g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}混沌大敌{/g}的迹象。他坚持声称自己没有犯下过任何罪行，而且似乎对西奥多拉夫人的死和维特威尔的背叛感到异常震惊。尽管严酷的审讯对老人每况愈下的身体造成了几乎足以致命的伤害，但即便如此，他也坚决不肯承认自己有罪。
languages.original_text: The investigation has found no wrongdoing the old man could be held accountable for. His body bears no signs of worshipping the {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Archenemy{/g}. He has confessed to no crime and seems quite shocked at the news of Lady Theodora's death and Voigtvir's treachery. The harsh interrogation techniques have taken an almost fatal toll on his failing health, yet forced no admission of guilt from him.

traits.locale_text: 调查发现，这位老人没有犯下过任何罪行，也没有任何可以追究的责任。他的身体没有任何崇拜混沌大敌的迹象。他坚持声称自己没有犯下过任何罪行，而且似乎对西奥多拉夫人的死和维特威尔的背叛感到异常震惊。尽管严酷的审讯对老人每况愈下的身体造成了几乎足以致命的伤害，但即便如此，他也坚决不肯承认自己有罪。

languages.text: Die Ermittlung hat kein Fehlverhalten seitens des alten Mannes aufgedeckt, für welches er bestraft werden könnte. Sein Körper zeigt keinerlei Anzeichen, dass er den {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Erzfeind{/g} anbeten würde. Er hat keinerlei Verbrechen gestanden und wirkt aufrichtig schockiert über die Nachricht von Lady Theodoras Tod und Voigtvirs Verrat. Die brutalen Verhörtechniken haben ihn in seinem gebrechlichen Zustand bis an die Schwelle des Todes gebracht, jedoch kein Schuldeingeständnis aus ihm herausgeholt.
languages.original_text: The investigation has found no wrongdoing the old man could be held accountable for. His body bears no signs of worshipping the {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Archenemy{/g}. He has confessed to no crime and seems quite shocked at the news of Lady Theodora's death and Voigtvir's treachery. The harsh interrogation techniques have taken an almost fatal toll on his failing health, yet forced no admission of guilt from him.

traits.locale_text: Die Ermittlung hat kein Fehlverhalten seitens des alten Mannes aufgedeckt, für welches er bestraft werden könnte. Sein Körper zeigt keinerlei Anzeichen, dass er den Erzfeind anbeten würde. Er hat keinerlei Verbrechen gestanden und wirkt aufrichtig schockiert über die Nachricht von Lady Theodoras Tod und Voigtvirs Verrat. Die brutalen Verhörtechniken haben ihn in seinem gebrechlichen Zustand bis an die Schwelle des Todes gebracht, jedoch kein Schuldeingeständnis aus ihm herausgeholt.

languages.text: D'après les résultats de l'enquête, le vieil homme ne s'est rendu responsable d'aucun acte répréhensible. Son corps ne montre aucun stigmate du {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Grand Ennemi{/g}. Il n'a pas avoué de crime et semble avoir été véritablement surpris, voire choqué, d'apprendre la mort de dame Théodora et la traîtrise de Voigtvir. Les techniques d'interrogatoire, assez musclées, ont failli avoir raison de sa santé déjà fragile sans pour autant lui arracher le moindre aveu de culpabilité.
languages.original_text: The investigation has found no wrongdoing the old man could be held accountable for. His body bears no signs of worshipping the {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Archenemy{/g}. He has confessed to no crime and seems quite shocked at the news of Lady Theodora's death and Voigtvir's treachery. The harsh interrogation techniques have taken an almost fatal toll on his failing health, yet forced no admission of guilt from him.

languages.text: Sorgu, ihtiyar adamın sorumlu tutulabileceği herhangi bir kabahat bulamadı. Bedeninde {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Şerbaşı{/g}'na tapınmanın hiçbir emaresini taşımıyor. Hiçbir suç itirafında bulunmadı. Leydi Theodora'nın ölümü ve Voigtvir'in ihaneti haberleri karşısındaysa bir hayli şaşırmış görünüyor. Sert sorgu teknikleri, hâlihazırda güçsüz düşmüş sağlığına ölümcül bir darbe indirmeye yaklaşsa da ağzından tek bir suçluluk kabulü dökülmesine yol açmadı.
languages.original_text: The investigation has found no wrongdoing the old man could be held accountable for. His body bears no signs of worshipping the {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Archenemy{/g}. He has confessed to no crime and seems quite shocked at the news of Lady Theodora's death and Voigtvir's treachery. The harsh interrogation techniques have taken an almost fatal toll on his failing health, yet forced no admission of guilt from him.
